snippet: Gay couples who want to marry immediately in Illinois because one partner has a life-threatening illness could do so starting Monday.
lead_paragraph: Gay couples who want to marry immediately in Illinois because one partner has a life-threatening illness could do so starting Monday.

headline.main: Illinois: Terminally Ill Allowed to Marry
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Terminally Ill Allowed To Marry

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
